name: Pixel World - platformer
description:
Pixel World is a 2d action/strategy platformer in pixel art style. The goal is to unlock all levels, coins and achievements. But watch out! Knights are out to get you, and spread nasty traps. Can you defeat the knights?

Pixel World is created for everyone! It is 100 % free with NO ads!

Play on different Levels (with different Obstacles and Enemies. Jump on Trampolines, go for checkpoints and reach the Trophy to complete the Level!

On your adventure you will find lots of coins to spend for Icons, Skins, and even more in the future!

Make your own highscores, complete all Levels, unlock achievements, skins and charakters with different abilitys and just have fun!
